sentences.sContent: Some of the more extreme contacts give you "cat eyes" or how about "owl eyes"?
sentences.sCn: 一些更酷的隐形眼镜可以给你一双"猫眼"或者是"猫头鹰的眼睛"。

sentences.sContent: A great owl, with yellow sulphurous eyes, called to him by his name, but he made it no answer.
sentences.sCn: 一只长着黄色硫磺的巨大眼睛的猫头鹰，呼唤着他的名字，但他没有应答。

synos.tran: [鸟]猫头鹰；枭；惯于晚上活动的人

words.tran: 猫头鹰般的；看似聪明的；面孔严肃的

trans.tranOther: a bird with large eyes that hunts at night
